data.actual_result: You see the category name as underlined.
data.expected_result: Underline should get escaped as all other Markdown formatting.
data.short_description: Underline formatting doesn't get escaped for category names for category synced/not synced info
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have manage channels permission - Create a category with a underline formatting in its name (e.g. `__Test__`) - Add a channel to this category - Edit the channel - Go to permissions - Observe the permissions sync/not synced with category warning
